Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The OFET mobilities are calculated in the saturation regime using the following equation : 2 , where W and L are the channel width and length , respectively , C i is the capacitance per unit area of the insulation layer.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| OFET mobilities |
| channel width (W) |
| channel length (L) |
| capacitance per unit area of the insulation layer (Ci) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| OFET mobilities |
| channel width (W) |
| channel length (L) |
| capacitance per unit area of the insulation layer (Ci) |

Note: OFET stands for Organic Field-Effect Transistor. The paragraph is discussing the calculation of the mobility of Organic Field-Effect Transistors in the saturation regime using the given equation. Therefore, OFET mobilities are considered a material property.
